title: Conspiracy Theorists Are Coming for the 15-Minute City
description: A movement to promote neighborhoods with amenities within walking distance has enraged far-right activists, climate deniers, and extremists.

title: Heat Pumps Sell Like Hotcakes on America's Oil-Rich Frontier
description: In Alaska, people are flocking to buy electric appliances instead of fuel-guzzling furnaces, as oil prices soar and temperatures plummet.

title: Workers Are Dying in the EV Industry’s ‘Tainted’ City
description: In Indonesia, sickness and pollution plague a sprawling factory complex that supplies the world with crucial battery materials.
